loading.title: Loading…
loading.description: Please wait while we get things ready.

modelSettings.label: Model Settings
modelSettings.description: Set the model options globally for all chats

keepAlive.label: Keep Alive
keepAlive.help: controls how long the model will stay loaded into memory following the request (default: 5m)

numGpu.label: Num GPU
numGpu.placeholder: Enter number of layers to send to GPU(s)

systemPrompt.label: Temporary System Prompt
systemPrompt.help: This is a quick way to set the system prompt in the current chat, which will override the selected system prompt if it exists.

historyMessageLimit.label: History message limit
historyMessageLimit.help: Limit how many previous messages are sent with each request.

historyMessageOrder.label: History message order
historyMessageOrder.help: Choose whether the newest or oldest messages are sent first.

slashCommandInjectionMode.label: Slash command injection
slashCommandInjectionMode.help: Choose how slash commands are inserted into the request.

apiProvider.label: API provider override
apiProvider.help: Force a specific provider for this chat (e.g. openai, anthropic).

extraHeaders.label: Extra headers (JSON)
extraHeaders.help: JSON object merged into request headers.

extraBody.label: Extra body (JSON)
extraBody.help: JSON object merged into request body.

serverChatLoadError: Failed to load server chat. Check your connection and try again.
serverChatsUnavailableNotConnected: Server chats are available once you connect to your tldw server.
serverChatsUnavailableServerError: Server chats unavailable right now. Check your server logs or try again.

deleteConfirm.pinned: Are you sure you want to delete all pinned messages?
deleteConfirm.today: Are you sure you want to delete all messages from today?
deleteConfirm.yesterday: Are you sure you want to delete all messages from yesterday?
deleteConfirm.last7Days: Are you sure you want to delete all messages from the last 7 days?
deleteConfirm.older: Are you sure you want to delete all older messages?

tooltip.last7Days: Delete all messages from the last 7 days

embeddingGen: Creating embeddings, this may take a while

cancelPullingModel.confirm: Are you sure you want to cancel the download? This will stop the download process. If supported by the provider, you can resume later.

error.label: Error
error.friendlyApiKeySummary: We couldn't reach your tldw server.
error.friendlyApiKeyHint: Your API key may be invalid. Open Settings → tldw server to check your URL and API key, then try again.
error.friendlyTimeoutHint: The server stopped streaming responses. Try again, or open Health & diagnostics to check server status.
error.friendlyGenericSummary: Something went wrong while talking to your tldw server.
error.friendlyGenericHint: Try again in a moment, or open Health & diagnostics to inspect server health.

markdown.couldNotDisplay: The message content could not be displayed. This may be due to invalid formatting.

commandPalette.ingestDesc: Save this page to your knowledge base
commandPalette.toggleSidebarDesc: Show or hide the chat sidebar
commandPalette.title: Command Palette

knowledge.title: Search your knowledge
knowledge.description: Open the knowledge search panel to find snippets and insert them into your chat.

moreTools.title: More tools available
moreTools.description: Access vision mode, image upload, quick ingest, and the full app.

commandPalette.title: Quick commands
commandPalette.description: Press {{shortcut}} to search commands, settings, and more.

modelSettings.title: Adjust model parameters
modelSettings.description: Fine-tune temperature, context length, and other model settings.

extDescription: Browser extension for tldw_server - your unified AI assistant with RAG, media processing, and more.
contextSaveToNotesNoSelection: Select text first to save to Notes.
contextSaveToNotesDeliveryFailed: Could not open the sidebar to save this note. Check that the tldw Assistant sidebar is allowed on this site and try again.
hfSendPageRejected: [tldw] Page send request rejected by tldw_server
hfSendPageErrorWithDetail: [tldw] Failed to send this page to tldw_server: $1. Check Settings → tldw server and try again.
hfSendPageError: [tldw] Failed to send this page to tldw_server. Check Settings → tldw server and try again.
hfSendPageSuccess: [tldw] Sent page to tldw_server for processing
hfSendPageException: [tldw] Something went wrong while sending this page to tldw_server. Check that your tldw_server and the extension are running, then try again.
hfPullInProgress: [tldw Assistant] A model pull request is already in progress. Please wait for it to finish before starting another one.
hfPullConfirm: [tldw Assistant] Do you want to send a request to your tldw_server to pull the "$1" model? This is independent of the huggingface.co website. Your server will start pulling the model after you confirm.
hfPullSending: [tldw Assistant] Sending a request to your tldw_server to pull "$1". Check the extension icon or your tldw_server logs for progress.
hfPullErrorWithDetail: [tldw Assistant] Failed to send a pull request for "$1": $2. Check Settings → tldw server and try again.
hfPullError: [tldw Assistant] Failed to send a pull request for "$1". Check Settings → tldw server and try again.
hfPullSuccess: [tldw Assistant] Request sent to your tldw_server to pull "$1". Monitor the extension icon or tldw_server logs for status.
hfPullException: [tldw Assistant] Something went wrong while sending a pull request for "$1" to your tldw_server. Check that your tldw_server and the extension are running, then try again.
path: How would you like to get started?
restartOnboardingConfirmMessage: This will reset your onboarding state and take you back to the setup flow.
